subject: Re: Order #SSN5984 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

Is it possible to cancel this order before shipping?

Thank you

conversations.body_text:
Hi I am unable to log in to view or edit the ticket due to my order being placed through Shop. If it has not been cancelled yet I can continue with the order. The only reason for cancellation was the delivery time as I saw it had not shipped yet, but if I can receive it by the end of next week it's not a problem. Order #SSN5984

Thanks

Hi G J,     We have confirmed that your order has been scheduled for shipment and will be dispatched from our US warehouse on the 19th. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, and we will address them promptly.
